title: Crime Alert 05.09.19
itunes:title: Crime Alert 05.09.19
description:
A Georgia man pleads guilty to strangling his wife two days after they signed divorce papers. A Minnesota man leaves his son to die in a hot car while he went to work. A Kentucky father charged with murdering his one-month-old son because he was angry at losing in a video game.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
